Title: Version 1.2.0 - UI Update
Description: Fixed the navigation button style bug and added smooth staggered animations for the executor panel.

Title: New API Integration
Description: Successfully integrated Roblox Avatar API to fetch local user profile headshots dynamically.

Title: Performance Fixes
Description: Reduced memory usage when loading external script lists and improved JSON parsing speed.

Title: Bug Fixes
Description: Resolved an issue where the Key System would occasionally fail on slow internet connections.
